extracted_metadata.description: How to say 'Awda in Hebrew? The 3rd International Conference on the Return of Palestinian Refugees From: 21-22/03/2016 *Concluding discussion with the audience: Return - from the margins to the mainstream* Chair: Umar al-Ghubari– Coordinator of Space for Return, Zochrot To watch the panel in Arabic: • مؤتمر العودة الثالث \ الجلسة التلخيصية: ال... To watch the panel in Hebrew: • כנס השיבה / פאנל: דיון מסכם: השיבה – מהשול... To watch the panel in English: • Conference\ Panel: Conclusion: Return - fr... To watch the panel in the original languages: • Conference\ Panel: Conclusion: Return - fr... *** about the conference: http://www.zochrot.org/en/event/56261 Like us on Facebook: / zochrot
